headline: AI analytics firm Pyramid Analytics secures $50 million from BlackRock
summary: Pyramid Analytics, an AI business analytics company, said on Monday it has raised $50 million in new financing from BlackRock, the world's biggest asset manager.  The global market for big data and business analytics is projected to reach $665.7 billion by 2033 after being valued at $225.3 billion in 2023, according to Allied Market Research.  Pyramid's platform uses a combination of machine learning and AI to simplify processes and data analysis for its clients, which include the U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA) as well as Hallmark, Deloitte and Volkswagen.
